faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our towing service in Amsterdam.

items.question: How quickly can you arrive?
items.answer: In Amsterdam, we aim to arrive within 30 minutes. In the surrounding areas, it depends on traffic and distance.

items.question: What types of vehicles do you tow?
items.answer: We tow passenger cars, vans & commercial vehicles (up to L1/3.5t), and small vans. We can also transport motorcycles and classic cars.

items.question: How does the insurance work?
items.answer: Transport is 100% insured. Your vehicle is covered for the entire journey, with coverage up to €2 million.

items.question: How much does a tow cost?
items.answer: We use fixed rates per zone. Call us at 06 25 375 323 for an exact quote or request online.

items.question: Are you available 24/7?
items.answer: Yes! We're available day and night for emergencies — including weekends and public holidays.

items.question: Where do you deliver my car?
items.answer: We deliver your car to a garage of your choice, your home, or another location in or around Amsterdam.

items.question: Can I ride along in the tow truck?
items.answer: Yes, there's room for one passenger next to the driver. Extra passengers unfortunately cannot join due to insurance regulations.

items.question: Do you accept credit cards?
items.answer: Yes, we accept cash, debit, and credit cards. For business clients, invoice payments are also available.
